data.text: Elihu mɔn yi a fala Yuba xa, a naxa,
N nan n dɛni bima,
N ma falane n ma bɔɲɛ faɲiyaan nan makɛnɛnma,
Alaa Nii Sariɲanxin nan n daxi,
N yabi, xa i nɔɛ,
En birin lan Ala yɛtagi,
Nayi, i nama gaxu n tan yɛɛ ra,
“Koni, i fala xuiin mɔn n tunla ma,
i naxa, ‘Fɛ yo mi n na,
Anu, Ala mɔn fɛɛn toma n na,
A n sanne sama kutun na,
“Koni, na feen ma,
Nanfera i a matandima,
Anu, Ala falan tima muxune xa kii wuyaxi,
A falan tiin muxune xa xiyene
nayi, Ala yi feene yita muxune ra,
alogo a xa muxune ba e wali ɲaxine yi,
Nayi, Ala muxun niin natangama nɛn gaburun ma,
“Ala mɔn muxun natɔrɔnma tɔrɔn na,
Nayi, donseen yi raɲaxu a ma,
A yi doyen mafurɛn, a yi xɔsi,
A yi maso gaburun na,
“Koni, na yi lan
Malekan yi kininkinin a ma, a naxa,
Nayi, na muxun fatin mɔn yi a dii ɲɔrɛ sɛnbɛn sɔtɔ,
Nayi, na muxun na falan ti Ala xa,
A luma sigin sɛ nɛn yamaan yɛtagi,
Ala bata n niin natanga gaburun ma,
“Ala na birin ligama,
alogo a xa e niin natanga gaburun ma,
“Yuba, i tuli mati n na ki faɲi!
N yabi,
Xanamu, i tan nan lan
